ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize leading and lagging indicators

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Set and prioritize safety-related goals

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Assess training needs (regulatory and risk-based)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Principles and common elements of safety management systems (e.g., continuous improvement, safety processes, controls, measurement, standards, implementation)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Principles and techniques for encouraging employee involvement and commitment (e.g., value-based safety)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Principles and techniques for encouraging management commitment to safety (e.g., voluntary protection program (VPP), mission statement, management involvement in jobsite assessment)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Techniques and principles for goal setting (e.g., SMART)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Principles and techniques of internal audits

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Competency/skills assessment management systems (e.g., new hire orientation, assurance of experience, job skills, on the job training) as it pertains to worker safety

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: General concepts of effective trainings (e.g., learning retention, adult learning principles, training delivery)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recordkeeping related to training and education (e.g., annual, one-time, recertification or retraining)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Management of corrective actions (e.g., follow up, follow through, closure of actions, time periods, tracking corrective actions)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Unsafe conditions and acts and how they relate to incidents (e.g., Swiss cheese model, bowtie model)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Management of change (MOC) procedure and organizational change process

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common elements of contractor or multi-employer worksite safety programs (e.g., prequalification, selecting, monitoring, managing risk between contractor and host)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 1 - Management Systems - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Process for assessing hazards associated with new products or chemicals

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 - Risk Management - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Resources for hazard prevention and control management (e.g., external resources, internal resources, industry standards, subject matter experts)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 - Risk Management - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Work planning and controls (e.g., job safety analysis, preliminary hazard analysis, job/task hazard analysis, safe work permit)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 - Risk Management - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Prevention through Design concepts (e.g., managing safety through the lifecycle of the program)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 - Risk Management - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common liability exposures (e.g., tort, joint liability, attractive nuisance)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 - Risk Management - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common types of insurance coverage (e.g., differences between property and liability coverage)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 - Risk Management - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Hierarchy of controls (e.g., elimination, engineering, substitutions)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 - Risk Management - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Interpret and apply information related to hazard prevention and control management (e.g., internal resources, external resources, industry standards, safety data sheet)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 - Risk Management - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Identify safety, health, and environmental risk (e.g., checklists, brainstorming, observation, lessons learned, experience, HAZID, process safety)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 - Risk Management - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Analyze safety, health, and environmental risk (e.g., severity and likelihood/frequency matrix, historical information, industry data, “what if” analysis, process safety)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 - Risk Management - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Evaluate and prioritize safety, health, and environmental risk (e.g., high/low risk)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 - Risk Management - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Review and refine implemented safety, health, environmental controls to ensure they are effective

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 - Risk Management - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Use a risk matrix

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 2 - Risk Management - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Apply the hierarchy of controls to various types of hazards while considering the likelihood and severity

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Concepts in the Globally Harmonized System of Classification and Labeling of Chemicals (GHS)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for slips, trips, and falls (from all levels)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for working with electricity

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for working in confined spaces

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for working around machinery and equipment

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for bloodborne pathogens

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for lead

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for asbestos

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for radiation (ionizing and non-ionizing)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for temperature extremes (e.g., cold or heat stress, contact with extreme temperatures, thermal stress)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for vibration (e.g., whole body, hand/arm)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for noise

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for ergonomic hazards associated with the type of work, body positions, or strain on the body from working conditions (e.g., improperly adjusted workstations/chairs, frequent lifting, awkward movements, poor posture, repetitive movements, use of too much force, compression)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for any form of chemical hazards (e.g., liquids, vapors, fumes, dusts, gases, flammable liquids, and pesticides)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common controls for workplace stressors (e.g., workload demand, fatigue, harassment, lack of schedule flexibility, lack of control)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Knowledge Of:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Occupational health programs (e.g., medical surveillance, fit for duty, return to work, substance abuse testing)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts that can cause slips, trips, and falls (from all levels)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts when working with electricity

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts when working in confined spaces

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts when working around machinery and equipment (e.g., caught in, struck by, pinch points)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize conditions that could lead to unsafe exposures to molds and allergens

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts related to potential exposures to bloodborne pathogens

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts related to potential exposures lead

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts related to potential exposures to asbestos

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts related to potential exposures to radiation (ionizing and non-ionizing)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts related to potential exposures to temperature extremes (e.g., cold or heat stress, contact with extreme temperatures, thermal stress)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts related to potential exposures to vibration (e.g., whole body, hand/arm)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts related to potential exposures to noise

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts related to ergonomic hazards associated with the type of work, body positions, or strain on the body from working conditions (e.g., improperly adjusted workstations/chairs, frequent lifting, awkward movements, poor posture, repetitive movements, use of too much force, compression)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts related to exposures to any form of chemicals (e.g., liquids, vapors, fumes, dusts, gases, flammable liquids, and pesticides)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 3 - Safety, Health, and Environmental Concepts - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Recognize unsafe conditions or acts related to workplace stressors (e.g., workload demand, fatigue, harassment, lack of schedule flexibility, lack of control)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Incident Investigation and Emergency Preparedness - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Fundamentals of causal analysis (e.g., 5 whys, root cause analysis)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Incident Investigation and Emergency Preparedness - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Components or elements of an effective incident/accident management program

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Incident Investigation and Emergency Preparedness - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Emergency action requirements/procedures (e.g., response plans, evacuations, preparedness, operation upsets)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Incident Investigation and Emergency Preparedness - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Components or elements of an emergency response plan (e.g., roles and responsibilities, emergency contact information, stakeholder notification, media response)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Incident Investigation and Emergency Preparedness - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Incident command structure in emergency response

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Incident Investigation and Emergency Preparedness - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Techniques for identifying gaps in an emergency response plan (e.g., table top drills, lessons learned)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Incident Investigation and Emergency Preparedness - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Basic elements of workers’ compensation and case management programs

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 4 - Incident Investigation and Emergency Preparedness - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Calculate incident and injury rates

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Cost/benefit analysis principles and common techniques (e.g., return on investment [ROI], as low as reasonably practicable [ALARP], as low as reasonably achievable [ALARA])

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Direct and indirect costs in relation to safety

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Experience modification rate (EMR), or premium rate, and how it is used

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Principles of positive safety/organizational culture and common techniques for creating a positive safety culture (e.g., Hearts & Minds, behavioral safety management [BSM], behavior-based safety [BBS], stop work, open communication, culture or perception surveys)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Indicators of a positive safety/organizational culture (e.g., leading indicators, management system, management commitment)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Techniques and processes for communicating hazards and controls to stakeholders (e.g., management, workforce)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Presentation techniques or best practices for communicating technical and other safety information to stakeholders (e.g., management, workforce)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Conflict management techniques (e.g., situational leadership, good conflict versus bad conflict, diffusion techniques, relationship management)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Common leadership strategies or principles (e.g., setting good example, building trust)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Knowledge To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: BCSP Code of Ethics

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Interpret cost/benefit analysis

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Interpret leading and lagging indicators (e.g., training metrics, safety initiatives, incident and injury rates)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Develop a safety business case for additional budget, resources, other support, etc. (e.g., use financial tools to make a case for investing in safety program or initiative)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Communicate safety on multi-employer/contractor worksites

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Facilitate or lead safety meetings (e.g., agenda, review safety plans, safety stand-down, shift handover)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Communicate (internal) safety activities and performance (e.g., reports, initiatives, lessons learned, requirements) to management and personnel

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Communicate (external) safety risks and performance information (e.g., reports, presentations, risk/incident plans) to key stakeholders (e.g., public safety organizations, regulatory agencies, community)

ceterms:assesses.ceterms:frameworkName: Domain 5 - Business Case of Safety - Skill To:
ceterms:assesses.ceterms:targetNodeName: Write communications that promote safety objectives and activities (e.g., safety proposal development, risk management plans, noncompliance response)

ceterms:description: The SMS examination contains 200 multiple-choice items with four possible answers and only one correct answer.
ceterms:name: SMS Examination

ceterms:requires.ceterms:experience: To qualify for the examination, SMS candidates must have ten (10) years of experience with at least 35% of primary job duties related to the management of safety related programs, processes, procedures, personnel, etc.
ceterms:requires.ceterms:name: Eligibility Requirements - SMS Examination
